text: Bárbara Plà (born July 17, 1983) is a Spanish rugby sevens player. She competed for the Spanish sevens team at the 2016 Summer Olympics. She and her brother Pol, both represented Spain at the Olympics in rugby sevens. She also played at the qualification tournament for the final spot in Ireland. Pla was on the 2013 Rugby World Cup Sevens squad for Spain. == References == == External links == * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Spain international women's rugby union players Category:Spain international women's rugby sevens players Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Spain Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: Bárbara Plà
